info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 8:10PM CDT until April 8 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham AL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...
Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights affecting Shelby, Bibb and Jefferson Counties.
Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Dallas, Bibb and Perry Counties.
.Heavy rainfall of 2 to 4 inches is expected tomorrow over the Cahaba River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Cahaba River.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cahaba River at Centreville.
* WHEN...From Monday morning to late Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Pasture lands begin to flood in the Centreville area. The river walk next to the Commerce building and school is nearly completely flooded by this stage.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday morning to a crest of 24.2 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
&&
The next statement will be issued Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Dallas, AL; Perry, AL
